Hi all,
This post is mainly directed to Mr Gilbert but I thought that maybe if 
someone else would like to comment that would be great.
I was browsing your lovely tsuba site and have a question regarding the 
last tsuba on page two of the Early Iron tsuba link.
http://home.earthlink.net/%7Ejggilbert/oldiron2.htm
You are writing that it's an unusual guard, does this mean its hard to 
kantei? How confident are you about it being a late Muromachi tsuba? 
Have you or someone else seen this type of tsuba before, maybe in books 
as for reference?
The thing is that I have a very similar tsuba, almost identical, and i 
would like to have as much information about it as possible. Do you 
think it may be from the same era as yours or would mine be a later copy?
The measurements on my tsuba are almost the same as yours, mine is 
slightly thicker.
8.0 cm H x 8.0 cm W x 0.4 cm T

Please take a look at it on
http://hem.bredband.net/odrike/Tsuba1.htm

Regards
Fredrik
